testimonials.title: What Our Merchants Say
testimonials.description: Hear directly from restaurants growing their business with Oddle.

items.name: Chef John Doe
items.quote: Oddle's online ordering system has been a game-changer for our delivery business. It's easy to use and integrates perfectly.

items.name: Maria Garcia
items.quote: The reservation system simplified our bookings immensely. Our front-of-house runs much smoother now, thanks to Oddle.

items.name: David Chen
items.quote: We love the marketing tools! The automated campaigns helped us bring back customers and significantly boost our repeat business.
